Name: Rabi(Kharif)_sd
Description: Rabi(Kharif) standard devIation in values of NDVI

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_max_date
Description: Date of Rabi(Kharif) maximum values of NDVI

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_plant_date
Description: Estimated date of Rabi(Kharif) planting based on NDVI phenology

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_harvest_date
Description: Estimated date of Rabi(Kharif) harvest based on NDVI phenology

Name: All_95th_prct
Description: The estimated 95th percentile values of all seasons in the NDVI historical record

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_AUC
Description: Rabi(Kharif) area under the curve of NDVI

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_AUC_v2
Description: Rabi(Kharif) area under the curve of NDVI estimated by splines

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_AUC_leading
Description: Area under the curve of NDVI  for the ascending part of the curve during the Rabi(Kharif) season

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_AUC_trailing
Description: Area under the curve of NDVI  for the decreasing part of the curve during the Rabi(Kharif) season

Name: Rabi_season_length
Description: Difference between Rabi plant_dates and harvest_dates in days

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_95th_diff_mn
Description: Difference between Rabi(Kharif) mean  NDVI and Rabi(Kharif) estimated 95th percentile of historical values

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_95th_diff_mx
Description: Difference between  Rabi(Kharif) max  NDVI and Rabi(Kharif) estimated 95th percentile of historical max values

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_95th_diff_AUC
Description: Difference between Rabi(Kharif) AUC  NDVI and  Rabi(Kharif) estimated 95th percentile of historical AUC values

Name: Rabi(Kharif)_AUC_diff_mn
Description: Difference between the Rabi(Kharif) mean area under the curve and Rabi(Kharif) area under the curve for NDVI
